thread.title: Another great stay
thread.title_full: Another great stay - Review of Even Hotel New York - Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SOPHIA K
title: Another great stay
text: This is my second time at an EVEN property, and I was not disappointed. Everything from check in to check out was clean, nicely decorated, and above all the service was outstanding. The restaurant offers healthy choices (I especially love their smoothies), and as a vegetarian, I truly appreciated it when the servers went out of their way to accommodate my diet, even offering alternatives that were off the menu. I would choose an EVEN hotel again during my next stay in NYC.
